frontmatter.title: Play and Visualize Spotify Music in Terminal with Mopidy and Ncmpcpp
frontmatter.description: Like Winamp, ncmpcpp is timeless classic for music applications. As I’ve picked up my work and slowly moved into the command-line space, I’ve found ncmpcpp very easy to use. Ncmpcpp is an mpd client and coupled with Mopidy I can browse Spotify playlists, search for artists, and play top tracks.
